mapper.insert: INSERT INTO market ( market_num, market_title, market_detail, market_startDate, market_endDate, place_name, market_type, booth_count, user_count, booth_fee, market_poster, market_posterName, market_thumbNail, market_thumbNailName) VALUES ( market_seq.nextval, #{market_title}, #{market_detail}, #{market_startDate}, #{market_endDate}, #{place_name}, #{market_type}, #{booth_count}, #{user_count}, #{booth_fee}, #{market_poster}, #{market_posterName}, #{market_thumbNail}, #{market_thumbNailName})
mapper.update: UPDATE market SET market_title = #{market_title}, market_detail = #{market_detail}, market_startDate = #{market_startDate}, market_endDate = #{market_endDate}, place_name = #{place_name}, booth_count = #{booth_count}, user_count = #{user_count}, booth_fee = #{booth_fee}, market_updateDate = sysdate WHERE market_num = #{market_num}
